name: @reactify/3dti-toolkit
description: JavaScript port of the 3D Tune-In Toolkit

scripts.build: concurrently -n browser,browser-debug,module,module-debug -c yellow,black.bgYellow,magenta,white.bgMagenta "node compile.js" "node compile.js --debug" "node compile.js --module" "node compile.js --module --debug"
scripts.transpile: rollup -c rollup.config.js -i src/binaural/hrir.js -o lib/binaural/hrir.js && rollup  -c rollup.config.js -i src/binaural/proxy.js -o lib/binaural/proxy.js
scripts.prep-release: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run transpile

author: Reactify <developer@reactifymusic.com> (http://reactifymusic.com)
